title: View With Your Heart
description: When a prodigal son returns to his small town, secrets could prevent a second chance at romance.Gavin Scott left home long ago. He wanted bright lights and a bigger city. He missed nothing from his small-town other than one woman and a few wild nights one summer. Not prone to sentimentality, he hasn’t looked back until an invitation brings his independent filmmaking career to his roots, and he learns she’s still there. Britton McKay didn’t expect to stay. Lake Traverse was only her summer town until her uncle’s death. As the owner of the tea shop she inherited, she braces herself for the annual film festival celebration which brings forward memories of some glorious summer nights and the secret she’s been keeping for too many years.Sometimes it’s all a matter of perspective before the heart can love again. ** PREVIOUSLY PUBLISHED as Touch Screen, Sensations Collection 4.
author: L.B. Dunbar
